title: (Wed Early Bird) Morgan2's Mail Thief + Why Lunchbox Wants Bodyguards + Mailbag: Parents Not Sure How To Handle Their Child Getting Bullied
itunes:title: (Wed Early Bird) Morgan2's Mail Thief + Why Lunchbox Wants Bodyguards + Mailbag: Parents Not Sure How To Handle Their Child Getting Bullied
description:
Someone tried to steal Morgan2's mail and she caught them on camera! Find out what she's doing now to keep her mail safe and find thief. Plus, Lunchbox shares why he wants to hire bodyguards to have with him at all times when the show goes to Las Vegas for the iHeart Festival this weekend. Bobby opens the mailbag and gives advice to a listener who says their 6-year-old daughter is being bullied. His wife wants to pull her out of the class, but he thinks she should throw a punch.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
